name: baby-steps
description: app to track baby/children milestones and moments

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp src/html/*.html public/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar public/index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:unminified && npm run build:css:minified
scripts.watch:css: npm run watch:css:unminified & npm run watch:css:minified
scripts.clean:css: npm run clean:css:unminified && npm run clean:css:minified
scripts.watch:css:unminified: npm run build:css:unminified && chokidar 'public/**/*.(css|less)' -c 'npm run build:css:unminified'
scripts.watch:css:minified: npm run build:css:minified && chokidar 'public/**/*.(css|less)' -c 'npm run build:css:minified'

author: Nicole Kelley
